ActorTalk: All the qualified photos have been uploaded. Now we can select one to print and take with us.
Which one do you want, Commandant? Since you'll be keeping it, I think it's best if you choose.
Lucia and I already talked about it. We want you to have this one, Commandant. It's a gift to remember today by.
It's from all of Gray Raven. Lee agrees too. I just checked with him. He wants you to keep it.
That's the end of the event. And looking at the time... we've been out for quite a while today.
If you're feeling tired, Commandant, Liv and I can head back to your lounge with you.
But if you still feel like exploring, we're happy to walk around the Commercial District with you a bit more.
There's no need to decide right away. You've still got some time off left, and Gray Raven will be with you every step of the way.
Aren't you going to take a keepsake too?
